host.label: Host
host.help: The host/IP address of the MQTT Broker/Server to connect to.

port.label: Port
port.help: The port of the MQTT Broker/Server to connect to.

user.label: Username
user.help: (Optional) The username to use to authenticate with the MQTT Broker/Server.

password.label: Password
password.help: (Optional) The password to use to authenticate with the MQTT Broker/Server.

device_key.label: Device ID Property/Key
device_key.help: The key or property where the device id will be pulled from. Defaults to 'device'
